C

city - Variable in class model.Client
Client's city.
Client - Class in model
Class used to store a client entry for the database with the necessary fields.
Client() - Constructor for class model.Client
Constructs a Client with no given information about it.
Client(int, String, String) - Constructor for class model.Client
Constructs a Client with his unique id, name and city.
Client(String, String) - Constructor for class model.Client
Constructs a Client just with his name and his city.
ClientBLL - Class in businesslogic
Class used to verify the validity of the commands specific for clients and to execute them.
ClientBLL() - Constructor for class businesslogic.ClientBLL
 
ClientDAO - Class in dataaccess
Class that extends the AbstractDAO class which contains all the particular database operations for clients.
ClientDAO() - Constructor for class dataaccess.ClientDAO
 
clientName - Variable in class model.Order
Order's client's name.
clientReportIndex - Static variable in class businesslogic.ClientBLL
index used to change the number at the end of each client report pdf file
close(Connection) - Static method in class connection.ConnectionFactory
Closes the current connection.
close(ResultSet) - Static method in class connection.ConnectionFactory
Closes the current resultSet.
close(Statement) - Static method in class connection.ConnectionFactory
Closes the current statement.
CommandControl - Class in presentation
Processes the input text file and extracts the commands to be executed.
CommandControl() - Constructor for class presentation.CommandControl
 
commandProcessing(String) - Method in class presentation.CommandControl
Based on what the first part of the command is, calls the Business Logic Layer to execute a certain action.
commandSplit(String) - Method in class presentation.CommandControl
Parses a command using RegEx into several parts.
connection - package connection
 
ConnectionFactory - Class in connection
ConnectionFactory establishes the connection with the database.
ConnectionFactory() - Constructor for class connection.ConnectionFactory
Constructor for the Class with no parameters.
createConnection() - Method in class connection.ConnectionFactory
Creates a connection between the java app and the database.
createDeleteQuery(String) - Method in class dataaccess.AbstractDAO
Creates the SQL DELETE query with the given name of the client/product that needs to be deleted.
createInsertQuery(String) - Method in class dataaccess.AbstractDAO
Creates the SQL INSERT query with the given values (the values must have all the fields in the given order in the database with the exception of the id; see the toString() methods in the Client, Product and Order classes).
createObjects(ResultSet) - Method in class dataaccess.AbstractDAO
Transforms the ResultSet which came as a response of a database query into a java object.
createProductUpdateQuery(int, String) - Method in class dataaccess.ProductDAO
Creates the SQL UPDATE query that updates the quantity of a given product.
createSelectQuery(String) - Method in class dataaccess.AbstractDAO
Creates the SQL SELECT query based on a simple condition.
